samples.question: What do you think is the most helpful invention at home?
samples.transcript: Personally I think laundry machine is the most beneficial one because you know at best we at test we have to go to the stream and we spread allies and do some mechanical you know punch or some punch to wash our laundry. However, after it invented, we put all under laundry on the laundry machine and use some washing washing function and also it has some dry function. So I guess it is really convenient for person especially people who living alone. So they can when they want to put the new clothes they just put all the all the stuff in the laundry machine and they go to wash and dry and after that they could put it once again. Okay. Another question that I see is often asked in in discussions about AI would be whether you use it at work or not. that is a hot topic. Okay.
